          <title>
            <string language="en">Scale drawing of a ladybird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skalazeichnung eines ladybird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schéma d'échelle d'une coccinelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenho da escala de um ladybird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione della scala di un ladybird</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Gráfico de la escala de un ladybird</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows actual size of a ladybird compared to a scaled drawing.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lady bird</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Istmaß eines ladybird, das 
mit einer eingestuften Zeichnung verglichen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'échelle grandeur 
d'une coccinelle comparée à un schéma mesuré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o tamanho real de um 
ladybird comparado a um desenho escalado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il formato reale di un 
ladybird confrontato ad un'illustrazione regolata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πραγματικό μέγεθος μιας 
λαμπρίτσας έναντι σε ένα ξελεπιασμένο σχέδιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra talla real de un 
ladybird comparado a un gráfico escalado.</string>
